testsuite.name: Credential issuance process for cross device

testcase.name: Opening the EUDI Wallet and viewing the dashboard
Initiating the QR code scanning for document addition
Scanning the QR code and viewing credential details
Issuing the new document via QR code
Completing the issuance process and viewing the success message
Viewing the newly added document on the dashboard
